participant_1.background:
I think my pets are the best things in my life.
I enjoy swimming, hiking, and spending time with my family.
i love to surf.
I've spent way too much money on gummy worms.

participant_2.background:
I am not close with my family and I prefer to spend time alone.
I'm a single mom working two jobs to support my children.
I used to wear a suit every day to work.
i have many girlfriends.
No, I prefer to wear comfortable clothes.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
It is going well! What are you up to today?
Just got off work! I am a single mom and I work two jobs to support my children.
That is a lot of work! I am impressed.
It is a lot, but I love my children and I would do anything for them.
That is really sweet. I am sure they are lucky to have a mom like you.
Thank you. They are my whole world.
What kind of work do you do?
I work as a waitress at a local diner and I also do some cleaning work on the side.
That sounds like a lot of work. Do you ever have any time for yourself?
Not really, but I do not mind. I love spending time with my children.
I am sure they love spending time with you too.
Thank you. I am glad they have a good mom.
You are welcome. I am sure you are a great mom.
